an10.216:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you an explanation of the teaching on creepy creatures.
an10.216:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an10.216:5.1: “What is the explanation of the teaching on creepy creatures?
an10.216:5.2: Sentient beings are the owners of their deeds and heir to their deeds. Deeds are their womb, their relative, and their refuge.
an10.216:5.3: They shall be the heir of whatever deeds they do, whether good or bad.
an10.216:6.1: Take a certain person who kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
an10.216:6.2: They’re creepy in body, speech, and mind.
an10.216:6.3: Doing crooked deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, their destiny and rebirth is crooked.
an10.216:7.1: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is crooked is reborn in one of two places, I say:
an10.216:7.2: in an exclusively painful hell, or among the species of creepy animals.
an10.216:7.3: And what are the species of creepy animals?
an10.216:7.4: Snakes, scorpions, centipedes, mongooses, cats, mice, owls, or whatever other species of animal that creep away when they see humans.
an10.216:7.5: This is how a being is born from a being.
an10.216:7.6: For your deeds determine your rebirth,
an10.216:7.7: and when you’re reborn contacts affect you.
an10.216:7.8: This is why I say that sentient beings are heirs to their deeds.

an10.216:10.1: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce violence and harming. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all creatures.
an10.216:10.2: They’re not creepy in body, speech, and mind.
an10.216:10.3: Doing virtuous deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, their destiny and rebirth is virtuous.
an10.216:11.1: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is virtuous is reborn in one of two places, I say:
an10.216:11.2: in a heaven of perfect happiness, or in an eminent propertied family of aristocrats, brahmins, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
an10.216:11.3: This is how a being is born from a being.
an10.216:11.4: For your deeds determine your rebirth,
an10.216:11.5: and when you’re reborn contacts affect you.
an10.216:11.6: This is why I say that sentient beings are heirs to their deeds.
